IX.iii.1.F.4.e
.
Example 1:  Removing the Income of Dependents
Situation
:  The award for a surviving spouse with a child is payable from August 1, 2014.  The child turns 18 on October 28, 2014.  The only family income is the child’s Social Security of $521 per month.  The family unit received three $521 Social Security checks totaling $1,563 between the date of entitlement and the date the child went off the award (short-term recurring income).
Result
:  Count IVAP of $1,563 effective August 1, 2014.  Reduce IVAP to $0 on November 1, 2014, under
38 CFR 3.31
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Dependents for Current-Law Pension Purposes
